item.title: How i set Admin and mod commands?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

after the command do this

 && playerRights >= 2)

replace the 2 with…

1 = mods +
2 = admins +
3= owners only

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)

it would look like that afterwords
